Package org.example

Class ProgramService

java.lang.Object
org.example.ProgramService
public class ProgramService extends Object
Provides services for managing programs, including adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving programs. This service can handle a list of programs and allows operations such as displaying program details, searching for programs, and managing their deletion status.
Author:
Tala Ahendi

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProgramService()
    Constructs a ProgramService instance and initializes the list of programs.

  • Method Details

    • addProgram

      public void addProgram(Program program)
      Adds a new program to the list of programs.
      Parameters:
      program - The program to be added.

    • getProgramByTitle

      public Program getProgramByTitle(String programTitle)
      Retrieves a program by its title.
      Parameters:
      programTitle - The title of the program to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The program with the specified title, or null if no such program exists.

    • updateProgram

      public void updateProgram(Program programToUpdate)
      Updates an existing program's details.
      Parameters:
      programToUpdate - The program with updated details.

    • deleteProgram

      public void deleteProgram(String title)
      Deletes a program by its title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the program to delete.

    • displayAllPrograms

      public void displayAllPrograms()
      Displays the details of all programs in the list.

    • displayAllProgramsNames

      public void displayAllProgramsNames()
      Displays the titles of all programs in the list.

    • programDetailsAsString

      public String programDetailsAsString(Program program)
      Converts the details of a program to a string format.
      Parameters:
      program - The program to convert to a string.
      Returns:
      A string containing the details of the program.

    • getDeletionStatus

      public String getDeletionStatus()
      Returns the deletion status of the last delete operation.
      Returns:
      The deletion status ("Success" or "Failure").

    • getDeletionMessage

      public String getDeletionMessage()
      Returns the message corresponding to the last delete operation.
      Returns:
      The deletion message.

    • findProgramByTitle

      public Program findProgramByTitle(String programTitle)
      Finds a program by its title, ignoring case.
      Parameters:
      programTitle - The title of the program to find.
      Returns:
      The program with the specified title, or null if no such program exists.
